sentences: Me peame laulma koos sel õhtul.
context: The word 'laula' is an Estonian verb that means 'to sing'. It is the basic form of the verb (infinitive) used to express the action of singing. In Estonian, verbs change their endings according to tense and person - 'laula' would become 'laulan' (I sing), 'laulad' (you sing), etc. The word appears commonly in contexts involving music performance, vocal expression, or describing someone's act of singing.
